text: awlyk alkafirun lm yakunuu lyfwtu allah fi aldunya hrbana, wama kan lahum min 'ansar ymnewnhm min eqabh. ydaeaf lahum aleadhab fi jhnm; li'anahum kanuu la yastatieun 'an yasmaeuu alquran smae mntfe, 'aw yabsuruu ayat allah fi hadha alkwn 'ibsar mhtd; lashtghalhm bialkufr aladhi kanuu ealayh mqymyn
